p: Eating quality characteristics were assessed in an acceptance test session according to AMSA [ 33]. Thirty persons, with previous experience, were recruited from the staff and students of the Department of Animal Science in the Faculty of Animal Nutrition and Feed Regulation. They were typical consumers (25–50 years old) of pork. A practicing session was performed before the test to allow consumers to become familiar with the test procedure, evaluation form, and sample presentation format.
